data.name: T2X
data.description:
T2X is a Next Gen Staking platform built on the TRON blockchain with major goals to disrupt the traditional DApp & Smart Contract Gaming sectors.

T2X offers a smart contract driven exchange that mints tokens every 24 hours and allows users to swap their TRON for T2X tokens in a auction style lobby format. 95% of the TRX that is pooled in the auctions smart contract each day are redistributed back out as dividends to those users who "Stake" their T2X tokens within the smart contract.

Their teams main focus is developing a large ecosystem of DApps and Smart Contract driven games that utilize the T2X token as form of reward. Each DApp built includes a "Blackhole" burn feature decreasing the amount of T2X in circulation. This acts as a measure to help counter the inflation of auction lobbies each day.

Since opening the platform in July of 2020 the team has proven its dedicated & track record by showing no signs of slowing down. Paving out a roadmap that includes a Profit Sharing DEX, PVP Smart Contract Games, and DeFi DApps.
